metadata.purpose: Training index for intelligent ticket routing system

categories.name: Information Security
categories.description: Cybersecurity training, data protection, phishing awareness, password security

courses.title: A Guide to Multifactor Authentication
courses.description: Learn how multifactor authentication (MFA) protects your accounts and data. This course explains what MFA is, why it's essential for security, and how to set it up across various platforms to prevent unauthorized access.

courses.title: Best Practices for Secure Internet Browsing
courses.description: Discover essential security practices for safe internet browsing. This training covers recognizing secure websites, avoiding malicious links, using secure connections (HTTPS), and protecting personal information while online.

courses.title: Creating and Managing Strong Passwords
courses.description: Master the art of creating and maintaining secure passwords. Learn best practices for password complexity, why password managers are essential, and how to avoid common password mistakes that compromise security.

courses.title: Dealing With a Security Incident
courses.description: Understand how to respond quickly and effectively to security incidents. This course covers recognizing security breaches, immediate response steps, who to contact, and how to minimize damage from security threats.

courses.title: Phishing 101
courses.description: Learn to identify and avoid phishing attacks that target employee credentials and sensitive data. This training explains common phishing tactics, warning signs to watch for, and how to report suspicious emails.

courses.title: Protection Against Malware
courses.description: Protect your systems from viruses, ransomware, and other malicious software. Learn how malware spreads, signs of infection, prevention strategies, and what to do if you suspect malware on your device.

courses.title: Safeguarding Against Business Email Compromise
courses.description: Understand business email compromise (BEC) attacks and how to prevent them. Learn to recognize fraudulent requests, verify suspicious communications, and protect company funds and sensitive information from email scams.

categories.name: Time Management
categories.description: Productivity techniques, scheduling, efficiency, work-life balance

courses.title: 4 Surprising Symptoms of Poor Time Management
courses.description: Discover the subtle signs of poor time management that impact productivity. This course explores chronic lateness, disorganization, broken commitments, and declining performance, providing practical strategies to regain control of your schedule.

courses.title: 5 Scheduling Tips for Time Management
courses.description: Master effective scheduling techniques to maximize your productivity. Learn five proven strategies for organizing your calendar, prioritizing tasks, blocking time effectively, and maintaining focus throughout your workday.

courses.title: 5 Tips to Take Control of Your Inbox
courses.description: Tame email overload with five practical inbox management strategies. Learn to organize messages efficiently, reduce email clutter, respond faster, and prevent your inbox from becoming a source of stress and lost productivity.

courses.title: 7 Tips for Effective Time Management at Work
courses.description: Transform your workday with seven powerful time management techniques. This course covers prioritization methods, avoiding distractions, batch processing tasks, and creating systems that help you accomplish more in less time.

categories.name: Leadership and Management
categories.description: Team leadership, management skills, supervision, coaching

courses.title: 6 Practices to Become a Better Leader
courses.description: Develop essential leadership skills with six proven practices. Learn to inspire and motivate teams, communicate vision effectively, make better decisions, build trust, and create a positive workplace culture that drives results.

courses.title: 7 New Manager Mistakes to Avoid
courses.description: Navigate the transition to management successfully by avoiding common pitfalls. This course identifies seven mistakes new managers often make and provides strategies to build credibility, delegate effectively, and lead with confidence from day one.

courses.title: Best Practices for Managing Remote Teams
courses.description: Master the unique challenges of leading distributed teams. Learn communication strategies, tools for remote collaboration, maintaining team culture, measuring productivity, and keeping remote employees engaged and connected.

categories.name: Project Management
categories.description: Project planning, execution, scope management, PM best practices

courses.title: 5 Project Management Mistakes to Avoid
courses.description: Learn from common project management failures and how to prevent them. This course covers poor planning, inadequate risk management, communication breakdowns, scope creep, and resource misalignment to help you deliver successful projects.

courses.title: Addressing Scope Creep
courses.description: Prevent projects from spiraling out of control with effective scope management. Learn to identify scope creep early, set clear boundaries, manage stakeholder expectations, and keep projects on track and within budget.

categories.name: Mortgage Fundamentals
categories.description: Lending basics, underwriting, processing, loan guidelines

courses.title: Analyzing Income for the Self-Employed Borrower
courses.description: Master the complexities of calculating income for self-employed borrowers. This comprehensive course covers tax return analysis, acceptable documentation, business income calculation, and how to determine qualifying income for mortgage approval.

courses.title: AUS Findings
courses.description: Understand Automated Underwriting System (AUS) results and how to work with them. Learn to interpret Desktop Underwriter (DU) and Loan Prospector (LP) findings, address conditions, and determine the best path forward for loan approval.

courses.title: All About E-Consent
courses.description: Learn electronic consent requirements for mortgage documents. This course explains e-signature regulations, compliance requirements, proper disclosure procedures, and how to obtain valid electronic consent from borrowers.

courses.title: Behind the Closing Table - Patriot Act Borrower Documentation
courses.description: Understand Patriot Act compliance requirements for borrower identification. Learn what documentation is required, how to verify identities properly, maintain compliance, and avoid common mistakes in customer identification programs.

courses.title: Behind the Closing Table - Rescore vs Supplements
courses.description: Learn when to use rapid rescores versus credit supplements. This training explains the differences between these credit improvement methods, timing considerations, cost factors, and which option delivers better results in various scenarios.

courses.title: Behind the Closing Table - Section H Fees
courses.description: Master the intricacies of Section H fees on the Closing Disclosure. Learn which fees belong in this section, how to disclose them correctly, tolerance requirements, and how to avoid costly disclosure errors that could delay closing.

courses.title: Behind the Closing Table - When to Use the Work Number
courses.description: Understand when and how to use The Work Number for employment verification. Learn the benefits of automated verification, when traditional VOEs are still required, and best practices for obtaining quick and reliable employment confirmation.

categories.name: Customer Service
categories.description: Client interaction, customer satisfaction, service quality

courses.title: 7 Types of Customer Service
courses.description: Explore seven distinct customer service approaches and when to use each. Learn about proactive service, reactive support, self-service options, and how to match your service style to customer needs for maximum satisfaction and loyalty.

courses.title: Active Listening with Empathy
courses.description: Develop powerful listening skills that build trust and understanding. Learn active listening techniques, how to demonstrate empathy effectively, read non-verbal cues, and make customers feel truly heard and valued.

courses.title: A Guide to Empathy at Work
courses.description: Build stronger workplace relationships through empathy. This comprehensive course teaches the difference between empathy and sympathy, how to understand others' perspectives, respond compassionately, and create a more supportive work environment.

categories.name: Health and Wellness
categories.description: Physical health, mental wellbeing, fitness, work-life balance

courses.title: 6 Reasons People Don't Exercise and How to Overcome Them
courses.description: Break through common exercise barriers and build lasting fitness habits. Learn to overcome time constraints, lack of motivation, intimidation, fatigue, and other obstacles that prevent people from staying active and healthy.

courses.title: 8 Signs Your Body Gives You A Month Before A Heart Attack
courses.description: Recognize critical warning signs of heart problems before they become life-threatening. This essential training identifies eight subtle symptoms that may indicate heart issues, empowering you to seek medical attention early and potentially save your life.

courses.title: A Beginner's Guide to Exercise
courses.description: Start your fitness journey with confidence using this comprehensive beginner's guide. Learn about different types of exercise, how to create a balanced routine, proper form basics, and how to progress safely as you build strength and endurance.

courses.title: Applying the FITT Principle to Your Workouts
courses.description: Optimize your exercise program using the FITT principle (Frequency, Intensity, Time, Type). Learn how to structure workouts effectively, progress safely, avoid plateaus, and achieve your fitness goals more efficiently.

courses.title: ACES Portal User Training
courses.description: Master the ACES Portal with comprehensive user training. Learn to navigate the interface, access key features, process loans efficiently, generate reports, and troubleshoot common issues to maximize your productivity with this essential tool.

courses.title: Azure SSO Tutorial
courses.description: Learn to use Azure Single Sign-On for seamless authentication across applications. This tutorial covers SSO setup, accessing integrated applications, troubleshooting login issues, and managing your Azure identity for secure, convenient access.

courses.title: 6 Tips for Successful Peer-to-Peer Training
courses.description: Become an effective peer trainer with six proven techniques. Learn how to share knowledge clearly, engage learners, provide constructive feedback, adapt to different learning styles, and create training experiences that truly stick.

courses.title: Advertising: The Latest
courses.description: Stay current with the latest trends and regulations in mortgage advertising. Learn about compliance requirements, TRID advertising rules, social media marketing guidelines, and how to create effective, compliant marketing campaigns.

categories.name: Instructor-Led Training (ILCs)
categories.description: Live interactive training sessions with instructors

courses.title: Advanced Variable Income with Essent (Processing & UW) (ILC)
courses.description: Deep dive into complex variable income calculations with Essent guidelines for processors and underwriters. This advanced instructor-led session covers overtime, bonus, commission income, and how to properly calculate and document variable income sources.

courses.title: CMG Product Overview w/ Matt Hemphill (ILC)
courses.description: Comprehensive overview of CMG Financial's complete product suite presented by Matt Hemphill. Learn about conventional, government, and specialty loan programs, competitive advantages, and how to match the right products to borrower needs.

courses.title: FHA Refinance Options (ILC)
courses.description: Master FHA refinance programs including rate/term refis and FHA Streamline refinances. This live training covers eligibility requirements, documentation needs, benefits to borrowers, and common mistakes to avoid when processing FHA refinances.

courses.title: Mastering Rescores: Policy, Procedure & CreditXpert Demo (ILC)
courses.description: Become proficient in the rescore process with hands-on CreditXpert training. Learn company policies, step-by-step procedures, when rescores are appropriate, and how to use CreditXpert tools to help borrowers improve credit scores quickly.

courses.title: Monthly Surefire Training (ILC)
courses.description: Stay up-to-date with Surefire CRM platform features and best practices. These monthly sessions cover new functionality, tips and tricks, campaign optimization, and how to leverage Surefire to generate more business and improve client communication.
